title: Forty sermons whereof twenty one are now first publish'd, the greatest part preach'd before the King and on solemn occasions / by Richard Allestree ... ; to these is prefixt an account of the author's life.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
publicationPlace: Printed at the Theater in Oxford and in London :
publisher: For R. Scott, G. Wells, T. Sawbridge, R. Bentley,
